text: what are the possible values for the font field’s `font_set` property? `GOOGLE` and what else?
Will verify, but I believe currently only Google is supported, as well as web safe fonts. Thanks for asking will update the docs when I learn more and will ping you
Thanks Jon, i was wondering the same thing yesterday!

awesome. for us theme developers, it would be nice to know if there are any immediate future plans for any other `font_set`s.

The reason I am asking: I’d hate to develop a custom typekit theme “solution” and then have you guys launch a typekit `fontset` a month afterwards.
Hey <@U25PYL3Q8> and <@U3T21PDBK> thanks for your patience on this one. It was a bit of an oversight on my part. Just to clarify, would this be a desirable change?
Basically, we would continue nesting standard groups as-is, but repeating groups would not be nested at all.
(this would be in addition to taking a look at how we might have the tool ‘remember’ when things are expanded/collapsed, etc)
And I really like how the repeater title is not not duplicated. Would there be a collapse option for repeater/repeater groups, though? Just thinking about scenarios where repeater counts are over 20
Would it be possible to add the option to hide the color picker on the "font" field type? I kind of want color settings to be in a separate spot
Click into that thread :point_up::skin-tone-2: and your wildest dreams will come true #voteForPedro

The two available options are `GOOGLE` and `DEFAULT`. default is for web safe fonts. I will reflect this in the docs.

I have no news currently on how this might evolve over time, but no significant changes to it are expected in the immediate/near future.
